Name: Beyond the Wizard
About the game: Beyond the Wizard is a platform action game about the adventures of the hero who wants to be a wizard. The main character trained his body to survive in a world full of wizards! And the opportunity comes to those who try. He had his first and last chance to become a wizard. Instead of having no magic or skill, he has strong power and spirit and has to leap over competing wizards with it! The main character will never give up! At least not unless you give up! P.S You can stream this game to your heart's content. On the contrary, I would be gratefulness. :)
